q.quote: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.
q.author: Christopher Morley

q.quote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
q.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

q.quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
q.author: Laurence J. Peter

q.quote: I don't usually lose my temper, but if I get angry, it's true - I'm scary.
q.author: Eva Mendes

q.quote: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
q.author: Stephen Hawking

q.quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
q.author: Buddha

q.quote: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
q.author: Alexander Pope

q.quote: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance.
q.author: Robert Quillen

q.quote: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
q.author: Josh Billings

q.quote: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
q.author: Confucius

q.quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
q.author: Mahatma Gandhi

q.quote: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
q.author: Mahatma Gandhi

q.quote: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
q.author: Mehmet Oz

q.quote: I shall allow no man to belittle my soul by making me hate him.
q.author: Booker T. Washington

q.quote: When angry, count to four; when very angry, swear.
q.author: Mark Twain
